mapper.select: SELECT CARD_NO, USER_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, EXPIRY_DATE, CARD_TYPE, CARD_COMPANY, BILLING_DATE, REGISTER_DATE FROM Card WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Card (USER_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, EXPIRY_DATE, CARD_TYPE, CARD_COMPANY, BILLING_DATE) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{cardName}, #{cardNumber}, #{expiryDate}, #{cardType}, #{cardCompany}, #{billingDate})
